2.1.13.en: • Updated pairing description of the PIR V4

2.1.12.en: • Minimum V7 Homey Firmware. • Added more PD07Z ids. • Removed force unsecure pair

2.1.10.en: • Added extra ID's for the Wallplug V2

2.1.9.en: • Updated Mesh Driver after fix 2 prevent false alarm triggers on PIR

2.1.8.en: • Changed reports for Pir V2 since users reported no alarm notifications

2.1.7.en: • Split the new reported V2 Pir into new V3 to solve issues. • Added new Doorsensor V2 support. • Added new Z-Wave Repeater support. • Fixed Dual and Tripple switch associations.

2.1.5.en: • Added newly reported device ID for Motion Sensor V2. • Added MultiChannelAss for 3 way switch. • Added test base for new Doorsensor V2. • Updated MeshDriver.

2.1.4.en: • Added newly reported device ID for the WallPlug V2.

2.1.3.en: • Made report parsers for V1 plug independend from the homey-mesh-driver. • Finished ( i hope so :) ) the code for the curtain contoller. • Setting changes for the Pir V1.

2.1.2.en: • Fix for V2 plugs and negative value reported back - THX 2 nlrb.

2.1.1.en: • Added test code for curtain controller. • Fixed add_unsecure since athom its secure zwave is buggy. • Fixed some language errors. • Added some more device ID's that users reported. • Fixed settings for the v2 plugs

2.1.0.en: Initial Beta Release V2.1 series - Breaking Changes for Wall Switch !! • Added support Homey Energy. • Added support for Touch Wall Switch Triple. • Driver split the Power Switching Plug V1 and V2 version - Could need re-pair of the Power Switching Plug V2. • Renamed wall switch driver names to the changed Coolcam naming - Will need re-pair of the Touch Wall Switch Dual. • Change: All battery powered devices are forced unsecure to avoid the problems in the Homey z-wave core.

2.0.21.en: Added support for Doorsensor RU and NZ region / Added support for PIRv1 RU region.

2.0.20.en: Added German Translation to the app.

2.0.19.en: Update setting for PIRv2 detection led Enable/Disable.

2.0.18.en: Extra setting added to the v2 PIR Motion detection event report.

2.0.17.en: Again back to the old mesh driver. Now updates dont get pushed to Homey.

2.0.16.en: Updated to latest mesh driver again after fixes being done by Athom.

2.0.15.en: Added new EU device ID's to the app for PowerPlug.

2.0.14.en: Switched back to the old mesh driver since the new one breaks reporting in the homey core.

2.0.13.en: Fixed missing signed: false in Doorbell/Siren.

2.0.12.en: Added some device ID's from the PIR.

2.0.11.en: • Added some device ID's from the PIR, Siren and Plug. • Update to latest Mesh-Driver.

2.0.10.en: • Small update for the PIRv2. • Update to latest Mesh-Driver.

2.0.9.en: Small update for single wall switches.

2.0.8.en: Added the new forum and issue links for the new appstore layout.

2.0.7.en: First reports came in of a real PIR v2 so id's are added.

2.0.6.en: Meter Reset in driver on WR01Z Plugs after support dropped in the Z-Wave Mesh driver after issues.

2.0.5.en: • Water Sensor not reporting in on leakage. • Motion Sensor sensitivity settings.

2.0.4.en: Added fix from z-wave mesh driver that should fix some trouble with the dual switches and a specific firmware version.

2.0.3.en: Added volume action cards for siren and doorbell mode NAS-AB01ZE.

2.0.2.en: • Fixed Siren Trigger card that did not fire correct. • Updated more device icons for better experience.

2.0.1.en: • Added support for the KeyFob/ Emergency Remote Control. • Added support for the SOS Remote button. • Updated device icons for better appstore experience. • Updated some device svg icons for better experience on Homey.

2.0.0.en: • Moved App to zwave-mesh driver and SDKv2. • Added all other know country/regio id's known in de z-wave alliance database in the app. • Added support for the NAS-SC01ZE Touch Wall Switch Single. • Added empty driver for PD02 so it shows in appstore as device icon/tile.
